item.title: By: ZapWizard
item.dc:creator: ZapWizard
item.description: Can we please get the logo in a vector format? .SVG for example. One tiny JPEG doesn't make for an official logo. Don't forget people also need to be able to put these onto PCB's, in which case a .SVG can be converted to .DXF or other vector formats.
item.content:encoded:
Can we please get the logo in a vector format? .SVG for example.
One tiny JPEG doesn’t make for an official logo. Don’t forget people also need to be able to put these onto PCB’s, in which case a .SVG can be converted to .DXF or other vector formats.

item.title: By: PETER KIRN
item.dc:creator: PETER KIRN
item.description: FYI, you should remove the leading www; it currently breaks the URI (and it's bad practice, anyway)!
item.content:encoded: FYI, you should remove the leading www; it currently breaks the URI (and it’s bad practice, anyway)!
